content.title: Size matters
content.text: Every material has its optimal vibration frequency. The optimal frequency in inversely correlated to the size of the material, that is: the larger the material the lower the frequency; the smaller the material, the higher the frequency.

items.content: Some instruments, like the trombone, just change its size to change pitch.
If you'd like for a thourough deep dive into harmonics, watch this >YouTube list about waves..
